hero.header: Sohayb Premium Extra virgin olive oil from our land in Sinai.
hero.text: Rich in Antioxidants Packed with Omega-9, Vitamin E, and polyphenols – great for heart health and immunity.

about.text: A family project that began in 2017 with the planting of our first olive tree in the farms of North Sinai. Today, we proudly expand our journey  bring premium quality olive oil directly to your home.
